patthana23.42:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.42:4.3: Ārammaṇe cha, anantare samanantare tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte cha, kamme āhāre indriye tīṇi, atthiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana23.42:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.42:5.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana23.42:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
